      • listAll

        public java.util.List<DBEntity<K>> listAll(java.lang.Class<? extends DBEntity<K>> clazz,
                                  java.lang.String row,
                                  DBManager.ORDER_BY order,
                                  int limit)
        List all elements ordering and with limit, zero if no limits. Null if no order.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of the entity to retrieve.
        row - The row to apply order.
        order - The order, ASC or DESC. Null if no order.
        limit - The max number of items. Zero for no limits.
        Returns:
        List of items, or an empty list. Never null.
